Description: Highly Available and Secure Web Application Infrastructure Stack

DBUsername.ConstraintDescription: Must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters

GitHubToken.Description: GitHub personal access token for CodePipeline (leave empty to skip CI/CD setup)

EnvironmentSuffix.ConstraintDescription: Must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash yum update -y yum install -y httpd systemctl start httpd systemctl enable httpd # Install CloudWatch agent wget https://s3.amazonaws.com/amazoncloudwatch-agent/amazon_linux/amd64/latest/amazon-cloudwatch-agent.rpm rpm -U ./amazon-cloudwatch-agent.rpm # Create a simple health check endpoint echo "OK" > /var/www/html/health # Create a simple index page cat > /var/www/html/index.html < Web Application

Welcome to the Production Web Application

Instance ID: $(curl -s http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id)

EOF

Source.BuildSpec:
version: 0.2
phases:
  pre_build:
    commands:
      - echo Logging in to Amazon ECR...
      - aws --version
  build:
    commands:
      - echo Build started on `date`
      - echo Building the application...
      # Add your build commands here
  post_build:
    commands:
      - echo Build completed on `date`
artifacts:
  files:
    - '**/*'
